results.title: CARDIAC ASSESSMENTS AND IMPLANTABLE LOOP RECORDER PLACEMENT IN THREE MALE GELADAS (THEROPITHECUS GELADA).
results.text_hl: One male had an elevated cTnI level (210 ng/L), reduced ejection fraction (46%), and multiple episodes of @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Supraventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013617 @@@supraventricular tachycardia@@@ and non-sustained @DISEASE_Tachycardia_Ventricular @DISEASE_MESH:D017180 @@@ventricular tachycardia@@@.

citations.NLM: Zec SH, Miller M, Hollinger C, Croft L, Goldman M, D'Andrea K, Moody JE, McCann C, Bartlett SL. CARDIAC ASSESSMENTS AND IMPLANTABLE LOOP RECORDER PLACEMENT IN THREE MALE GELADAS (THEROPITHECUS GELADA). J Zoo Wildl Med. 2025 Mar;56(1):175-183. PMID: 40067238
citations.BibTeX: @article{40067238, title={CARDIAC ASSESSMENTS AND IMPLANTABLE LOOP RECORDER PLACEMENT IN THREE MALE GELADAS (THEROPITHECUS GELADA).}, author={Zec SH and Miller M and Hollinger C and Croft L and Goldman M and D'Andrea K and Moody JE and McCann C and Bartlett SL}, journal={J Zoo Wildl Med}, volume={56}, number={1}, pages={175-183}}

results.title: [Regulatory adaptive status in determining the effectiveness of bisoprololum and sotalolum in patients with hypertensive disease and paroxysmal supraventricular tachycardia].
results.text_hl: RESULTS: Both regimens of the combination drug therapy comparably improved the structural and functional status of the heart, increased exercise tolerance, effectively suppressed @<m>DISEASE_Tachycardia_Supraventricular</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013617 @@@SVT@@@ paroxysms, and improved the quality of life.

citations.NLM: Tregubov VG, Pokrovsky VM, Nazhalkina NM. [Regulatory adaptive status in determining the effectiveness of bisoprololum and sotalolum in patients with hypertensive disease and paroxysmal supraventricular tachycardia]. Kardiologiia. 2017 SJan;57(S1):345-354. PMID: 29276907
citations.BibTeX: @article{29276907, title={[Regulatory adaptive status in determining the effectiveness of bisoprololum and sotalolum in patients with hypertensive disease and paroxysmal supraventricular tachycardia].}, author={Tregubov VG and Pokrovsky VM and Nazhalkina NM}, journal={Kardiologiia}, volume={57}, number={S1}, pages={345-354}}
